title: General Knowledge Quiz (50 Questions)
description: Challenging but fair across pop culture, history, science, geography, and tech.

items.q: Which Beatle crossed Abbey Road barefoot?
In The Matrix, does Neo take the red pill or the blue pill to learn the truth?
Who won the first season of American Idol?
What year did the original Pac‑Man arcade game release?
Which actor played both Magneto and Gandalf?
Who was the first rapper to win a Pulitzer Prize for Music?
What film did Steven Spielberg win his first Oscar for Best Director?
Which Shakespeare play features Rosencrantz and Guildenstern?
What TV show coined the phrase ‘Winter is Coming’?
Who painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel?
What year did the United States land Apollo 11 on the Moon?
Which U.S. president served the shortest time in office?
Who was the last Tsar of Russia?
The Hundred Years' War was primarily fought between which two countries?
Who delivered the famous ‘I Have a Dream’ speech?
What country gifted the Statue of Liberty to the U.S.?
Which empire was ruled by Genghis Khan?
The Cuban Missile Crisis happened during which U.S. president's term?
What year did women gain the right to vote in the U.S.?
Who was the British Prime Minister during most of World War II?
What element has the chemical symbol ‘Na’?
Which part of the cell contains genetic material?
What is the rarest blood type in humans?
How many teeth does a normal adult human have?
Which scientist developed the three laws of motion?
What organelle is called the ‘powerhouse of the cell’?
Which element is liquid at room temperature: mercury or sodium?
What is the only mammal capable of true flight?
What is the main gas found in Earth's atmosphere?
Which natural phenomenon is measured by the Richter scale?
What is the capital of Canada?
Which African country was formerly called Abyssinia?
What river flows through Paris?
What is the largest island in the world (not counting continents)?
Which country has the most natural lakes?
In which European city would you find the Acropolis?
Which desert covers much of Mongolia and northern China?
What line of latitude runs through the center of Earth?
Which mountain range separates Europe and Asia?
What country has the most time zones?
What does HTTP stand for?
What company developed the first mass‑market computer mouse?
What year was the first iPhone released?
What does GPS stand for?
What is the name of the first man‑made satellite launched into space?
In computing, what does ‘GUI’ stand for?
What video game console introduced the character Sonic the Hedgehog?
What was the first video uploaded to YouTube?
What company created the Walkman?
What year was Google founded?
